ygData.subject: Official List Online Meeting / Guild Newbie Hunt
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, As you may recall Suzanne was organizing an online meeting for mailing list.  We chatted and agreed that Brell Serelis would be a great server to
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

As you may recall Suzanne was organizing an online meeting for mailing
list. We chatted and agreed that Brell Serelis would be a great server to
have the meeting on. This way we can all meet eachother, and also have a
subsequent guild event. The subsequent event would be a newbie hunt,
during which newbies could hunt critters, and higher level guild members
could help them out.

I'd like to hold a brief vote on the time and place of the meeting on
brell. The time matters because we all have different schedules. The
place only matters in terms of where the newbie hunt will take place.
Please respond to this email if you have a preference (if you don't care,
you dont need to respond). If any given meeting time is impossible for
you, please say that, I'll try and minimize those conflicts.

Meeting places:
- Greater Faydark stone ring (kelethin newbie zone)
- East Freeport newbie zone

Meeting times:
- Tuesday August 10th 6pm-8pm PST
- Thursday August 10th 6pm-8pm PST
- Saturday August 14th 10am-12pm PST

Vote will be closed friday at 6pm PST and I'll post the results that
evening.

I'd like to use the guild chat feature to make our meeting easier. Even
if you're not planning on playing on Brell, you can make a newbie and join
the guild, to use this feature. It allows us to send tells to our entire
guild, so we can hear conversation even if we're not exactly in the same
physical area.

I'd also like to suggest an unofficial guild hunt Saturday August 7th at
noon PST. The location will be wherever the official one will be held
(results posted Friday evening). This is for those of us who'd like to
get into playing together ASAP.

- Christina
